Subject: How to change EPP server address for MacOS client installation
Description: Hello, Customer need a clarification how to change EPP server address for MacOS client installation. Could you please clarify if the EPP server address for MacOS client installation can be changed only from the "epp_install_parameters.txt" file in the client archive, or it can be done another way?
Solution_Comment__c: Our partner confirmed that we can close the ticket after we replied to his queries regarding the MAC OS deployment and IP change.
